baneCards.name: Terrified
baneCards.description:
When you attack, remove 1 success produced during that test.
At the end of your turn, you may discard a prepared skill to discard this bane.

baneCards.name: Despondent
baneCards.description:
You cannot spend inspiration. (You can still discard inspiration.)
During the action phase, a nearby hero may discard 2 inspiration to discard this bane.

baneCards.name:
Captured
(Front)
baneCards.description:
Captured
Remove your figure from the map.  You are unaffected by other game effects and cannot perform other actions.
When you would discard this bane, flip it instead.
Action: You attempt to escape.  Flip this bane.

baneCards.name:
Captured
(Back)
baneCards.description:
Escape!
You try to escape capture with strength and stamina.
Test Might: 2

If you pass, your captors are brutal, but too weak to stop your escape. Suffer 1 facedown damage. Then place your figure in any explored space and discard this bane.

If you fail, you are not strong enough to escape. Discard this bane and become captured.
